content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a wooden chest (position (-16.5, -49.5))

### Iron plate factory at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) and a wooden chest (position (40.5, -80.5))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) and a wooden chest (position (43.5, -81.5))
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) and a wooden chest (position (43.5, -82.5))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) and a wooden chest (position (43.5, -81.5))
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) and a wooden chest (position (40.5, -80.5))

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Inserter system at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)), wooden chest (position (2.5, 0.5)), and small electric pole (position (2.5, 1.5))

### Inserter system at position (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) and wooden chest (position (0.5, 2.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment but being out of fuel
- Ensure you have fuel in your burner equipment before using it
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure you have ingredients to smelt in your furnace before using it
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
- Ensure you have input liquid in your steam engine before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
- Ensure you have fluid present in connections of your offshore pump before using it
### Errors when placing entities but having no space
- Ensure you have space to place entities before attempting to place them
